name: Gates of the Incas
overview: The Inca gods don't take kindly to mortals invading their realm. But you as an intrepid archeologist and treasure hunter won't let that deter you. To move through the temple you must unlock each gate by solving the puzzle. As you go deeper, you find the gods are more vigilant. You have less time and your lantern is growing dim, so you can't see as far.
